response.text: I understand you want to update the topbar to have a more modern style, include account management icons on the right, a status bar in the center, and a button to collapse or open the navigation menu on the top left. I'll modify the existing files and create a new component for the topbar to achieve this.

file-changes.explanation:

1. Created a new file 'TopBar.js' in the 'admin/src/components/' directory. This new component includes: - A button to toggle the navigation menu - A status bar in the center - Account management icons on the right (user profile, settings, and logout)
2. Updated the 'global.css' file to include new styles for the top bar and its components: - Styled the top bar with a white background and box shadow - Added styles for the menu toggle button, status bar, and account icons - Included a transition for the navigation menu width to allow for smooth collapsing/expanding - Added a new class for the collapsed state of the navigation menu
These changes will create a modern, functional top bar as requested. You'll need to integrate the new TopBar component into your main layout and implement the toggle functionality for the navigation menu.
